title: Pazarlı Höyük
description: Settlement located about 30 km. from Alaca Höyük in modern Turkey's Çorum province. The site contains structures dated to the Neolithic, Hittite, and Phrygian periods.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the Pazarli site from coordinates listed in entry in the Megalithic Portal.
properties.title: Megalithic Portal location of Pazarli
